import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default class RegistrationComponent extends React.Component{ state:any = { firstname: '', secondname: '', email: '', password: '' } submitRegistration = ()=>{ console.log(JSON.stringify(this.state)) fetch ('http://localhost:3000/users',{ method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(this.state), headers:{ "Content-type": "application/json" } }) setTimeout(()=>{}, 1000) } handle = (event:any)=>{ this.setState({[event.target.name]:event.target.value } as any) } render() { return(
FirstName:
SecondName:
Email:
Password:
На главную
) } }
